popularityCurve.label: in recent years much has been said about the post modernist claims about science to the effect that science is just another form of raw power tricked out in special claims for truth-seeking and objectivity that really have no basis in fact

a religious view that has nothing to do with science daily the airwaves and the newspaper racks are filled with such inflammatory claims
